text: Who won big at the 60th annual Grammy Awards, honoring the best music performances of 2017? Check out the list of winners ( in bold ) and nominees : Bruno Mars accepts Song of the Year for Thats What I Like during the 60th Annual Grammy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY NETWORK Album of the year Childish Gambino, Awaken, My Love! Jay - Z, 4 : 44 Kendrick Lamar, Damn Lorde, Melodrama WINNER : Bruno Mars, 24K Magic RECAP : Minute - by - minute review of the evening's action Record of the year ( for performers ) Childish Gambino, Redbone Luis Fonsi and Daddy Yankee feat. Justin Bieber, Despacito Jay - Z, The Story
